verses.roman:
āpane dakṣiṇa deśa karilā gamana
grāme grāme kailā kṛṣṇa-nāma pracāraṇa

synonyms: āpane—personally; dakṣiṇa deśa—South India; karilā—went; gamana—traveling; grāme grāme—in each and every village; kailā—He did; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; pracāraṇa—broadcasting.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu personally went to South India, and He broadcast the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa in every village and town.
